original_title: รักเป็นบ้า
overview: Muang Tai accidentally attacked a woman who broke into the house and ransacked his belongings. And in the woman there was a certain amount of pills with her. Muang Tai had to take care of the woman like never before, including feeding, feeding, etc. The mad woman had seizures. a congenital disease And the convulsions are getting more intense day by day. Muang Tai had to watch all the time in order to give medicine as advised by her sister who was a doctor. Because when the mad woman bites her tongue and if she misses the medication that could mean life
title: CrazyLove
